about_the_game:
666 Second Rule an Unholy Adventure

666 Second Rule is a short action game where you take the role of a messed-up parent pretending to care about your child and using the dark forces on your journey. The baby is on the dirty-dirty ground. You know what can happen!

🐜 Slay Swarms of Insects 🐜


Arm yourself with swift reflexes and battle through hordes of pesky insects! With each foe vanquished, collect their legs as dark currency to unlock the secrets of the shadow realm.

👟 Upgrade Your Arsenal 👟


Experience the thrill of wielding new, stronger slippers as you progress through the twisted narrative. Crush your enemies with enhanced power and show no mercy to those who stand in your way!

🌟 Harness Sinister Powers 🌟


Delve deeper into the occult and harness the might of pentagrams and other dark powers. Unleash devastating spells and bend the forces of nature to your will!

❌ Desperate Times, Desperate Measures ❌


The child's life hangs in the balance, but beware - the path to redemption is riddled with malevolence. Can you navigate through the twisted choices and save the cute innocent baby from the clutches of the darkness?

🎮 Experience 666 Second Rule Now! 🎮


Embark on this gripping action-packed journey, fraught with sinister powers and a heart-stopping quest to rescue the child from a fate worse than death!

🔥 WISHLIST NOW 🔥

highlighted.name: Maybe Try Hitting the Real One???
You Have Come Closer to God

content_descriptors.notes: You can destroy insects. oh, and hit the baby...

name: 666 Second Rule

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4.0 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce MX130
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: 666 Second Rule is an action game where you take the role of a tormented parent battling relentless insects. Utilize dark powers to fend off their disturbing attempts to crawl into the baby's head. Embrace the darkness within and prepare for an intense and gritty showdown.
